law.catch_line: Establishment of Kentucky Tobacco Exhibition Center.

text.section: There shall be established the official Kentucky Tobacco Exhibition Center celebrating and documenting the contributions of tobacco to the history and economy of the Commonwealth and the role of Nelson County in tobacco's growth, manufacturing, and sale in the state.
The Kentucky Tobacco Exhibition Center shall be located in Nelson County.

law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 399, secs. 1 and 2, effective July 15, 1988.
